posts.post_text: March 28, 2017 at 9:22 AM#9there was a bug in an earlier version regarding using SearchResult keyword, maybe there still is some obscure problem with it, that only appears with your show/console.try to do the Search first, then in the result dialog select "World Searchresult"then do (a world limited) replace on the objects you want:CodeReplace Attribute "Pan" At -270 Thru 270 With -265 Thru 275 if Preset 2.1 thru(assuming it is the position presets you want to change)finally go back to full world (World 1 please)
